001/*

006
007package renderer.scene.util;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011
012import java.util.ArrayList;
013import java.awt.Color;
014
015/**
016   Convert a {@link Model} object into a wireframe {@link Model}.
017<p>
018   See <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Point_cloud" target="_top">
019                https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Point_cloud</a>
020
021   @see renderer.pipeline.PrimitiveAssembly
022*/
023public class WireFrame
024{
025   /**
026      A static factory method that converts a given {@link Model}
027      into a {@link Model} made up of line segments. This method
028      converts each {@link Triangle}, {@link TriangleStrip},
029      {@link TriangleFan} and {@link Triangles} in the {@link Model}
030      into an appropriate number of {@link Face} primitives.
031
032      @param model  {@link Model} to convert into a wireframe
033      @return a {@link Model} that is a wireframe version of the input {@link Model}
034   */
035   public static Model make(final Model model)
036   {
037      final Model wireframe = new Model(new ArrayList<Vertex>(model.vertexList),
038                                        new ArrayList<>(), // empty primitiveList
039                                        new ArrayList<Color>(model.colorList),
040                                        "Wireframe: " + model.name,
041                                        model.getMatrix(),
042                                        new ArrayList<>(), // empty nestedModels
043                                        model.visible,
044                                        model.doBackFaceCulling,
045                                        model.frontFacingIsCCW,
046                                        model.facesHaveTwoSides);
047
048      for (final Primitive p : model.primitiveList)
049      {
050         if (p instanceof Triangle)
051         {
052            final Triangle t = (Triangle)p;
053            wireframe.addPrimitive(new Face(t.vIndexList,
054                                            t.cIndexList,
055                                            t.cIndexList2));
056         }
057         else if (p instanceof TriangleStrip)
058         {
059            final TriangleStrip p2 = (TriangleStrip)p;
060            int c = 0;
061            for (int i = 0; i < p2.vIndexList.size() - 2; ++i)
062            {
063               final int a = 1 + c; // a is either 1 or 2 (since c is 0 or 1)
064               final int b = 2 - c; // b is either 2 or 1 (since c is 0 or 1)
065               final Face face = new Face();
066               face.addIndices(p2.vIndexList.get(i + 0),
067                               p2.cIndexList.get(i + 0),
068                               p2.cIndexList2.get(i + 0));
069               face.addIndices(p2.vIndexList.get(i + a),
070                               p2.cIndexList.get(i + a),
071                               p2.cIndexList2.get(i + a));
072               face.addIndices(p2.vIndexList.get(i + b),
073                               p2.cIndexList.get(i + b),
074                               p2.cIndexList2.get(i + b));
075               wireframe.addPrimitive(face);
076               c = 1 - c;  // c alternates between 0 and 1
077            }
078         }
079         else if (p instanceof TriangleFan)
080         {
081            final TriangleFan p2 = (TriangleFan)p;
082            for (int i = 1; i < p2.vIndexList.size() - 1; ++i)
083            {
084               final Face face = new Face();
085               face.addIndices(p2.vIndexList.get(0),
086                               p2.cIndexList.get(0),
087                               p2.cIndexList2.get(0));
088               face.addIndices(p2.vIndexList.get(i),
089                               p2.cIndexList.get(i),
090                               p2.cIndexList2.get(i));
091               face.addIndices(p2.vIndexList.get(i + 1),
092                               p2.cIndexList.get(i + 1),
093                               p2.cIndexList2.get(i + 1));
094               wireframe.addPrimitive(face);
095            }
096         }
097         else if (p instanceof Triangles)
098         {
099            final Triangles p2 = (Triangles)p;
100            for (int i = 0; i < p2.vIndexList.size() - 2; i += 3)
101            {
102               final Face face = new Face();
103               face.addIndices(p2.vIndexList.get(i + 0),
104                               p2.cIndexList.get(i + 0),
105                               p2.cIndexList2.get(i + 0));
106               face.addIndices(p2.vIndexList.get(i + 1),
107                               p2.cIndexList.get(i + 1),
108                               p2.cIndexList2.get(i + 1));
109               face.addIndices(p2.vIndexList.get(i + 2),
110                               p2.cIndexList.get(i + 2),
111                               p2.cIndexList2.get(i + 2));
112               wireframe.addPrimitive(face);
113            }
114         }
115         else
116         {
117            wireframe.addPrimitive(p);
118         }
119      }
120
121      for (final Model m : model.nestedModels)
122      {
123         wireframe.addNestedModel( make(m) );  // recursion
124      }
125
126      return wireframe;
127   }
128
129
130
131   // Private default constructor to enforce noninstantiable class.
132   // See Item 4 in "Effective Java", 3rd Ed, Joshua Bloch.
133   private WireFrame() {
134      throw new AssertionError();
135   }
136}
